comments.en:
The name of the remote queue is PORT1.

This printer did not work well at all with RedHat 6.1's lpr package.
Symptoms: Only one job would print, lpq would sometimes hang, and then the print queue needed to be cleaned out, and lpd restarted. lpr-0.41-2 is what comes with RH 6.1.
Solution: Upgrade to lpr-0.50-7.6.x. Works great!

This printer takes over a minute to warm up from power saver mode. While warming up, lpq will report "PrinterError: WARMING UP". It's not really an error.

Consumables/Refills: Separate CYMK color toner cartridges
